title: Add email notifications
description: As a project manager, I want to receive email notifications for story status changes and task assignments so that I can stay informed about project progress without constantly checking the application.
iWant: to receive email notifications for story status changes and task assignments
soThat: I can stay informed about project progress without constantly checking the application

acceptanceTests.title: Story status change notifications
given: I am subscribed to notifications for a user story
when: The story status changes from Draft to Ready
then: I should receive an email notification within 5 minutes
The email should contain the story title and new status

acceptanceTests.title: Task assignment notifications
given: I am assigned to a new task
when: A task is created with my email as assignee
then: I should receive an email notification immediately
The email should contain task details and due date

acceptanceTests.title: Email preferences configuration
given: I am logged into the application
then: I should be able to enable/disable different notification types
My preferences should be saved and applied to future notifications
